titles.title: MP21 All The Riches Of His Grace

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v1 v3 v1 v4 v1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
All the riches of His grace,
All the fulness of His blessings,
All the sweetness of His love
He gives to you,
He gives to me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Oh, the blood of Jesus,
Oh, the blood of Jesus,
Oh, the blood of Jesus,
It washes white as snow.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Oh, the word of Jesus,
Oh, the word of Jesus,
Oh, the word of Jesus,
It cleanses white as snow.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Oh, the love of Jesus,
Oh, the love of Jesus,
Oh, the love of Jesus,
It makes His Body whole.
